name: Launch to the top
description:
Launch to the top!

Launch to the top of the mountain in this foddian-like game for the ludwig jam, come for the game and stay for the jazzy music!

You can only control the cannon, which gives a unique but tricky movement. Will you be able to overcome the mountain filled with obstacles and reach the flag? Only your perseverance will answer this. There's also a timer for all the speedrunners out there (My PB is 9m9s)!

How to play?

You can play in your browser here (which I suggest since the .exe is very big for some reason), you can download with the link below or use this alternate web link: https://cannonfoddian.netlify.app/

Controls are Space to shoot and A and D to turn, also playable with a controller, in which case, A is to shoot and the joystick is to turn.

More info:

I'm really proud of this game, especially since it was a unique mechanic and I love foddian games, I was a bit busy so I couldn't use all the 10 days, so there are some parts that are unpolished, but it's a complete game and I'm really happy with the result. also my friend VerreContena made an amazing song in such a short delay, which brings the game to life!

If you want to play the original non-fixed version (it has missing platforms which makes the game unbeatable), here it is: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1RJ3g_iY1MqMLDkCrWqA6--azbzwT_yLj/view?usp=shari...

This game was made using my homemade (almost released) JT Engine (engine in he browser for 2d web games): https://github.com/ToniestTony/JT-Engine
